docs.lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, March 27 -- Tax-supported birth-control assistance in the form of advice, drugs and devices is increasing in all parts of the country.

headline.main: Tax Aid to Birth Control Is Rising Across Nation; Public Facilities Are Being Established in 33 States Senator Gruening of Alaska Seeks a Positive Approach TAX AID ON RISE FOR BIRTH ADVICE

docs.snippet: CHICAGO, March 27 -- Tax-supported birth-control assistance in the form of advice, drugs and devices is increasing in all parts of the country.

byline.original: By AUSTIN C. WEHRWEINSpecial to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: A sociologist reported yesterday a rising tide of violence in Harlem caused by an increased use by narcotics addicts of nonopiate drugs.

headline.main: LAW ASKED TO CURB NONADDICTIVE PILLS

docs.abstract: E Harlem Prot Parish sociologist S Fiddle backs Sen Metcalf bill to curb sale and possession of barbiturates, amphetamines and hypnotic drugs, NYS Legis com hearing, NYC; links recent wave of violence in Harlem to their use
docs.snippet: A sociologist reported yesterday a rising tide of violence in Harlem caused by an increased use by narcotics addicts of nonopiate drugs.
